channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch studies the prophetic hymn of praise in Isaiah 42, while also commenting on how God deals with idolatry and how the Lord makes His truths clear for the deaf and blind. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sanctity Within Reach: Pier Giorgio Frassati
channel.desc: Christine M. Wohar and Wanda Gawronska (niece of Pier Giorgio) explore Blessed Pier Giorgio Frassati's spiritual life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother counsels viewers to ask the Lord for pardon, thanking him for his constant mercy, love and goodness despite our human faithlessness. The awesome presence of God is the answer to all the world?s wants and needs. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: John Preiss, President of the Fatima Family Apostolate, tells about his connection to Fr. Robert J. Fox, while discussing his book, ?Eucharist: Heaven and Earth Unite.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: St. Robert Bellarmine was one of Catholicism?s leading voices for reform and renewal, at a time when the Protestant revolt threatened to tear it apart. As a doctor of the Church, he was first and foremost, a teacher. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mozambique, Je Suis Un Deplace Interne
channel.desc: Cabo Delgado, la province la plus septentrionale du pays, a ?t? durement touch?e par la violence qui a commenc? en 2017 lorsque des terroristes ont lanc? des offensives ? grande ?chelle contre la population locale. Le drame de ces gens est sans fin. Ils ont tout perdu, m?me leur famille pour beaucoup d?entre eux. La g?n?rosit? des gens qui ont accueilli les victimes du terrorisme a ?t? extraordinaire. L??glise a essay? tant bien que mal d?all?ger la souffrance des enfants, des femmes et des a?n?s. Elle a commenc? par la distribution de nourriture et, maintenant, elle se concentre sur les soins psycho spirituels des victimes. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch and Dr. Richard Sherlock, a convert from Mormonism, discuss the ways the faith of the Latter-Day Saints church differs from the Catholic narrative of Jesus Christ. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord explore the life of St. Nicholas of Tolentino, patron saint of the souls in Purgatory. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Every week a different host brings on a panel of 3 experts to tackle topics on the minds of Catholics. From theology to social media, from young parents to the universal church, surround yourself with solid answers as you enter the Catholic Sphere! (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Father Mitch Pacwa gives short meditations on each of the Five Mysteries of Light introduced by Pope John Paul II. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Blessed Sacrament
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite a litany in honor of the Most Blessed Sacrament from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Good Or Evil: Who Decides?
channel.desc: In our culture many find no need for celibacy in the single life, in priesthood or even in marriage. Apologist and author Dr. Raymond De Souza explains celibacy and what it means for people, whatever their calling in life may be. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Revelation: The Second Coming
channel.desc: CH. 12 - INCARNATION AND MARY'S "YES"DEFEATS SIN, SATAN AND DEATH. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Widow's Walk With Christ
channel.desc: Dr. Ronda Chervin and Anne Lassiter look at how widows can cope with feelings of doubt after the death of a spouse. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Pro-life OB/GYN Dr. Alicia Thompson shares her journey from agnosticism to the Catholic faith. Marcus Grodi hosts. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Dr. Brian Engelland discusses Catholic social teaching and the four key pillars for a business built on integrity. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 3 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Ralph Martin discusses his new memoir, A Life in the Spirit, his work of fundamental Catholic renewal, and his call to apostolic mission in the Vatican and throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Freedom And Authority
channel.desc: Episode 6 begins teaching us about Authority, it's definition, examples of its uses and a list of abuses. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Papal Audience With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: From the Vatican, Pope Leo XIV delivers his weekly address to the faithful. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fathers For Good
channel.desc: Fr. Francis Gustilo and Frank Padilla discuss the role of men in their homes, church parishes and communities. Men are called to be leaders and to set examples for family, friends and neighbors. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford reflects how life is a gift mankind loves but we often forget the Giver. We need to acknowledge the gift by a true love for God. (10 minutes).

channel.desc: The Little Angel leads kids through the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary from Jesus' first Miracle at Cana to the Institution of the Eucharist at the Last Supper. (30 minutes).

channel.title: The Wild Goose

channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Baptism of Christ, Wedding at Cana, Proclamation of the Kingdom, Transfiguration and Institution of the Eucharist help us to receive the graces of salvation from Christ through Mary's intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grab Your Catechism With Fr. Connor
channel.desc: Fr. Charles Connor discusses the seventh commandment ?Thou Shalt Not Steal,? and how the unjust taking of material goods diminishes the respect of the labor of the person who earned it. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed James Kern and his fervent love of the priesthood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Philosophers' Bench
channel.desc: Similar to how ancient civilizations often used myths to explain the world, Dr. Kreeft and Dr. Howard examine how the writings of CS Lewis and JRR Tolkien can help us obtain a better understanding of God and the world He created. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Families contemplate how we can overcome resentment and the refusal to forgive others. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch and Dr. Richard Sherlock, a convert from Mormonism, discuss the ways the faith of the Latter-Day Saints church differs from the Catholic narrative of Jesus Christ. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: An EWTN documentary on the London connection to Carlo Acutis, featuring his mother, Antonia, and Fr. Alexander Sherbrooke, whose dynamic parish in Soho mirrors Carlo?s intense devotion to the Blessed Sacrament. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA

channel.desc: Christine Wohar, the Executive Director of FrassatiUSA and author of Finding Frassati, joins Br. John to discuss Piere Giorgio Frassati?s life, spirituality, and path to Sainthood. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Perou : Les Huit Meres
channel.desc: Au d?but des ann?es 1980, une organisation r?volutionnaire communiste appel?e Sendero Luminoso ? Sentier lumineux ? a lanc? une op?ration terroriste brutale dans les r?gions rurales des Andes p?ruviennes, utilisant la terreur sans piti?. L'arm?e envoy?e pour combattre le groupe terroriste a ?galement fait un usage excessif de la force, d?truisant des villages et tuant de nombreux civils innocents. En 2003, ? la fin de 20 ans d'insurrection, plus de 70 000 personnes ?taient mortes ou avaient disparu. Encore aujourd'hui, les traumatismes occasionn?s par ce conflit affectent profond?ment la vie quotidienne du peuple p?ruvien. La Congr?gation des S?urs missionnaires de J?sus Verbe et Victime apporte soins et r?confort ? ces r?gions ?loign?es. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Blessed Solanus Casey
channel.desc: Solanus Casey was known far and wide as the miracle-working Capuchin from Detroit, and his beatification was attended by 60,000 people at Ford Field in 2017. Michael O?Neill examines his simple yet remarkable life. (30 minutes).

channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about Catholic fundamentals, while also touching on religion versus relationship and the notion of a link between the Church and the U.S. Government. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Widow's Walk With Christ
channel.desc: Dr. Ronda Chervin and Anne Lassiter continue their look at widowhood from a Catholic perspective, with an engaging discussion on how to meet the difficulties of widowhood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother talks about how we need to be poor in spirit and realize that suffering is not about pain it is an opportunity to be like Jesus. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Dr. Brian Engelland explores the goodwill fostered by a business model built on integrity, servant leadership, and virtue. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 4 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Accompany Colm Flynn across breathtaking Italy with a group of young men from the United States on a life-changing pilgrimage in honor of soon-to-be saint, Pier Giorgio Frassati. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Great Britain On Location
channel.desc: James McCullough speaks to Fiorella Nash, with the Society for the Protection of Unborn Children, about her pro-life work and her book on radical feminism. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Carlow Choir Of Louisana: 'lead Kindly Light' St. Patrick's Cathedral, Dublin
channel.desc: Music from the Carlow Choir of Alexandria, Louisiana. The group performs in St. Patrick?s Cathedral in Dublin, Ireland. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Benedicta: Marian Chant From Norcia
channel.desc: Experience the daily life of the Benedictine Monks of Norcia, and watch as they record their new album, ?Benedicta,? which contains ancient, never-before recorded Marian chants. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Light In The Darkness Of Our Days
channel.desc: Fr. Michael van der Peet, SCJ recalls his friendship with Mother Teresa and shares his insights which include a reflection of her ?Dark Night.?. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).
